data.title: Atlas Home Improvement
data.meta_description: Atlas Home Improvement consists professionals who are committed to excellence. Click here to learn more about our team.
data.text:
Meet the Atlas Home Improvement Team

Management Team

David Bobby

Company Principal

David has been a Licensed Builder since 1989. He wears many hats, but his main role is the company’s General Manager. David spends much of his day training and mentoring Atlas staff to become the best they can be.

“It makes me proud to see our employees work so hard to take care of our customers to whom we owe our success!”

Darian Bobby

Company Principal

Darian’s engineering background brings a technical approach to the business. He also has a creative side which allows him to oversee the sales department. He is also a Licensed Builder.

“I believe we have put together the most experienced and professional staff of employees available in home improvement.”

Ela Pichan

Director of Operations

Ela has over 25 years of experience as a Financial Controller specializing in accounting, consulting and tax preparation. She is a strategic leader and problem solver. Atlas is fortunate to have someone with her strong work ethic who is capable of communicating with and motivating others to be their best.

"I like the people and values of the company. Atlas treats their employees like family!"

Eric Huff

Sales Manager

Eric has a Structural Engineering background and over 30 years of experience in sales and management. He has a unique ability to bring a synergy between our professional fabricators and sales team in order to accomplish the goals of our customers.

"I'm proud to work for a company that treats its employees like family and strives to help our customers with a high quality, fairly priced solution!"

Nicole Podschlne

Call Center & Events Manager

Nicole has worked in our call center for more than 12 years.. In addition to her wonderful customer service skills, she is known as a multi-tasker who gets things done. Nicole uses a systematic approach to her job which makes her a perfect leader for our team.

"I like having a job that keeps me busy and allows me to teach others as well as continue to learn myself!"

Phillip Grose

MARKETING AND RECRUITMENT MANAGER

Phillip has worked in the Marketing and Recruitment advertising field for 23+ years with a focus on the Home Improvement Industry. He uses a data-based approach to marketing to drive a strong ROI for our company's marketing initiatives along with working hand in hand with our other department heads to find the best possible people to join our team.

“It is amazing to be part of such a wonderful “work” family whose sole focus is to help make people's lives better with the products and services we offer.”

Amber Clark

Office Manager

Amber has worked in an office setting for a little over 7 years. She had a knack for organization and our main office has been much improved since she came on board. Amber has lost track of all the hats she is supposed to wear.

"It is nice to work for a company that you can see grow every day and everyone who works here is dedicated to that growth."

Dave Ford

QUALITY CONTROL MANAGER (BATHS, KITCHENS & STAIRLIFTS)

Dave has amassed more than 20 years working in the home improvement business. It seems there is nothing he is not capable of and is known as a team player who always takes a lot of pride in his work. Dave is responsible for making sure that all installations are done to the Atlas Standard.

"I am impressed Atlas uses such unique top quality products. This makes for a good investment for homeowners which I like providing!"

Jessica Compton

PURCHASING / WAREHOUSE MANAGER

Jessica has been in the home improvement industry for over 8 years. She is talented in various departments of production and warehousing. Jessica has a strong eye for detail and a need to improve efficiency. She loves to problem solve and has a get it done attitude. In her free time, Jessica loves spending time with her family and traveling.

“I enjoy working for a brand that I believe in. I have never worked anywhere that loves their employees so much, I couldn’t be in a better place than with Atlas!”

Ryan Huntley

ASSISTANT SALES MANAGER

Ryan has spent 15+ years in different management roles. He has a unique empathy that allows him to listen to both customers and sales teammates to find solutions. Ryan stresses the importance of being able to put yourself in someone else’s shoes and understand how they feel or think as being key to his success.

“I enjoy being part of a company that cares about its customers and employees while making a difference in the lives of everyone!”

Ruben Mota

SENIOR ACCOUNTANT

Ruben has spent more than 10 years in the accounting field. He is always willing to take on new roles and responsibilities and finding alternative solutions to challenges. Ruben is also fluent in both English and Spanish. When he gets a day off you will find him hanging with friends and family.

"I like working for a company that stands by both their customers and employees."

Kevin Fritz

FIELD SUPERVISOR & QUALITY CONTROL (GUTTERS & GUTTER HELMET)

Kevin is a senior employee, having been with Atlas for more than 20 years. He specializes in the installation of Gutter Helmet and Titan Gutters. He is involved with Training and Quality Control to improve workmanship for his department. Kevin is known to have very few errors with his work.

"I have been working for Atlas since high school. I recommend the company as a great place to work, especially if you appreciate quality workmanship and materials!"

Ken McCann

PROJECT FOREMAN (KITCHENS & BATHS)

Ken has more than 30 years of experience in construction. His lifetime of experience allows him to tackle even those most challenging projects and his perfectionistic personality makes sure it is done right. Ken is one of the key members at Atlas.

“I love having the opportunity and ability to help people have the kitchen or bathroom of their dreams

David Chambers

MASTER PLUMBER

David Chambers is a seasoned master plumber with over 20 years of experience in the industry. Over the years, he has honed his skills and expertise, earning a reputation for his meticulous attention to detail.

"I really enjoy being an asset to the plumbing community and the fact that my work has touched the lives of countless individuals!"

Kamrin Newman

FIELD TRAINER & QUALITY CONTROL (GUTTERS/GUTTER HELMET)

Kam has more than 8 year's experience working for Atlas. He has excelled as a professional sheet metal worker and is very motivated to always do his best work. Kam is a natural leader and has helped others to become the best they can be.

"There are a lot of things I enjoy about my job but probably my favorite thing is helping older homeowners stay safe and live independently in their home!"

Rick Shoner

FIELD TRAINER & QUALITY CONTROL (GUTTERS & GUTTER HELMET)

Rick has more than 17 years in the sheet metals trade with about 5 of that focusing on gutters. He is very outgoing and has a positive attitude. Rick excels at training because he takes great pride in his work and expects the same from everyone.

“My favorite part of working for Atlas is to hear how much people love the way their house looks with new gutters and Gutter Helmet!”
